Name: Sex Adventures - The Naughty Maid
About the game: About the game An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a very naughty maid who shamelessly interrupts the romantic evening of a vacationing couple. She refuses to sell her uniform, but makes an offer to join in their fun. Visual Novel Description THE COUPLE – Denisa and Marco are finally together on a much needed vacation. He’s been more away than home, and Denisa is struggling with their separation. She’s frustrated they don’t have the time to be together like they once were, and she’s afraid they will turn into one of those boring couples like her parents. Aware of their difficulties, Marco booked a week-long vacation at a famous resort to talk things through and maybe find a way to spice up the relationship. Imagine his surprise when their first romantic evening is interrupted by a sexy maid with killer legs, hot moves, and absolutely no shame regarding the young couple naked on the bed. THE NAUGHTY MAID – Elena Gomez is not your average cleaning lady. She’s young, hot, and absolutely in love with her job. She will clean your room, fluff your favorite pillows, and fill the tub with that special fragrance you never knew you liked, all while swaying her hips in the sexiest french maid uniform the resort has ever seen. She has absolutely no limits when it comes to making your stay memorable…so when the hot couple she found in the room offer to buy her sexy maid uniform to spice up the night, she doesn’t hold back and makes a bold counter-offer... Will our couple accept the naughty Maid’s proposal? Follow the story and find out… Features - 50+ HD renders - Animations
